        Description copied from interface: IDataTypePersistenceHandler
        Converts a value returned by the JDBC driver into a value suitable for storing on the bean.
        Specified by:
        jdbcToBean in interface IDataTypePersistenceHandler
        Overrides:
        jdbcToBean in class DataTypePersistenceHandlerBase
        Parameters:
        property - the associated property. May be null.
        jdbcValue - the value returned by the JDBC driver. Not null. See JdbcType for a reference of Java types for each JDBC type.

      • beanToJdbc

        public java.lang.Object beanToJdbc(IEntityPropertyInfo property,
                          java.lang.Object beanValue)
        Description copied from interface: IDataTypePersistenceHandler
        Converts a bean value into the appropriate JDBC value type.
        Specified by:
        beanToJdbc in interface IDataTypePersistenceHandler
        Overrides:
        beanToJdbc in class DataTypePersistenceHandlerBase
        Parameters:
        property - the associated property. May be null.
        beanValue - a value stored on the bean. Not null.
        Returns:
        the corresponding JDBC value. Must be an instance of the type associated with the IDataTypePersistenceHandler.getJdbcType().
        See Also:
        IDataTypePersistenceHandler.jdbcToBean(gw.entity.IEntityPropertyInfo, Object)
